## BrowserJsPlumbInstance.removeClass() method

Remove one or more classes from the given element or list of elements.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeClass(el: Element | NodeListOf<Element>, clazz: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  el | Element \| NodeListOf&lt;Element&gt; | Element, or list of elements from which to remove the class(es) |
|  clazz | string | A space separated list of classes to remove. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
